description:
Legendary costumes for your officers from other DYNASTY WARRIORS forces will be added.
Enjoy fighting battles in an all-new way.

■Content
Legendary Costumes for:
Diaochan, Lu Bu, Dong Zhuo, Yuan Shao, Zhang Jiao, Meng Huo, Zhurong, Zuo Ci, Chen Gong, and Lu Lingqi

■How to use
You can change costumes from camp by selecting "Party" - "Select Costume".
name: Legendary Costumes Others Pack
